GTM & GA4 Inspector is a powerful yet simple Chrome extension designed for digital marketers, analysts, and developers who need quick access to Google Tag Manager (GTM) and Google Analytics 4 (GA4) tracking IDs on any website.

Key Features:

Instant Detection: Quickly identify and display all GTM and GA4 IDs embedded in a webpage with a single click.
Copy to Clipboard: Conveniently copy detected IDs to your clipboard for easy use in other applications.
User-Friendly Interface: Clean, modern UI makes it easy to understand and use, even for those new to web analytics.
Lightweight & Fast: The extension runs efficiently in the background, ensuring a smooth browsing experience.
Who is this for?

Digital Marketers: Quickly verify GTM and GA4 tags on your website or competitors' sites.
Web Developers: Ensure proper implementation of GTM and GA4 tags during development.
SEO Specialists: Analyze how tracking tags are used across different sites.
Data Analysts: Easily audit tracking setups and verify tag configurations.
Whether you're setting up a new site, troubleshooting tag issues, or simply curious about how other sites manage their tracking, GTM & GA4 Inspector makes the process quick and straightforward.

How to Use:

Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Navigate to any website where you want to inspect the GTM and GA4 tags.
Click the GTM & GA4 Inspector extension icon in your browser toolbar.
Hit the "Inspect" button to view the detected IDs.
Optionally, copy the IDs directly to your clipboard for easy access.
Why Choose GTM & GA4 Inspector?

No need for complicated tools or manual code inspectionâ€”just install, click, and get the information you need.
Ideal for professionals who need to validate tracking tags quickly without disrupting their workflow.
Get started today and ensure your GTM and GA4 tags are always correctly implemented!
